title: High-level federal AI strategy announced
summary: Early, high-level strategy articulating priorities for AI research, development, and international competitiveness.

title: Foundational trustworthy AI principles
summary: Federal guidance emphasizing civil rights, non-discrimination, and transparency in public-sector AI use.

title: AI risk management framework
summary: Risk-oriented framework for organizations deploying AI systems, focusing on governance and responsible practices.

title: Executive-level direction on safe & secure AI
summary: Wide-ranging executive action addressing security, labor impacts, and civil rights in AI.

title: Ongoing hearings & draft bills
summary: Ongoing hearings and draft legislation exploring national AI transparency, data protection, and sector-specific regulation.
